title: Task 1: Explain how a work demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch references earlier architectural traditions.

Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch references earlier architectural traditions.

Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch references earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 2: Explain how a work demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch deviates from earlier architectural traditions.

Response accurately uses ONE example of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch deviates from earlier architectural traditions.

Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific VISUAL evidence to explain HOW the House in New Castle County by Robert Venturi, Denise Scott Brown, and John Rauch deviates from earlier architectural traditions.

title: Task 3: Explain why a specific work of art demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Robert Venturi choose to reference or deviate from earlier architectural traditions.
The response accurately uses ONE example of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Robert Venturi choose to reference or deviate from earlier architectural traditions.
The response accurately uses TWO examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain WHY Robert Venturi choose to reference or deviate from earlier architectural traditions.
